text: Zlatko Mateša (; born 17 June 1949) is a Croatian politician. He was Prime Minister of Croatia from 1995 to 2000. He was a member of the Croatian Democratic Union. He is the president of the Croatian Olympic Committee and honorary consul of Mongolia in Croatia. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Croatia Category:Politicians from Zagreb
title: Zlatko Mateša
